body.name: Air Purifiers for Bedroom, Cobectal HEPA Air Purifier with H13 True HEPA Air Filter, Portable Air Purifier with Sleep Mode, Speed Control,Timer for Bedroom, Room,Kitchen,Pets,Office
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 17. Order within 4 hrs 4 mins
features: EFFICIENCY FILTRATION:Cobectal Air Purifier features a true HEPA air filter that captures 99.97% of particles. Besides, this uses advanced air spiral technology and 360-degree inlets, which can improve the air in a room as large as 108 square feet every hour. The small portable air purifier is perfect for pet rooms, desks, bedrooms, dormitories, offices, and other small rooms

SLEEP BETTER: The air purifiers for bedroom adopt silent DC motor and noise reduction fan blade design, operates quietly. Especially when the sleep mode is activated, which reduces the fan speed to the lowest setting,as low as 24 db. You will not hear any sound anymore, but the air cleaner is really working. And the button indicator on the screen will automatically turn off after 10s no operation. Enjoy good air while sleeping without interruption

ENERGY-SAVING: We understand the importance of conserving energy. The small room air purifier is designed with an adjustable timer for 1-9 hours. So you can flexibly set the usage time and improve the air at regular intervals. And this air purifier has a low power rating of 10W. At high speed, the power usage remains extremely low. Its exquisite design and efficient purification capacity make it ideal for households with pets, as well as a thoughtful Christmas gift for loved ones

USER-FRIENDLY: The HEPA air purifiers for home has 4 modes (Sleep/1/2/3), which is convenient for you to choose the suitable fan speed according to the ambient air quality. (Notice: F0 is sleep mode).The Check Filter Indicator will let you know when it’s time for a fresh filter. It is recommended to replace the filter at least every 3-6 months to extend the life of the air purifier! Search ASIN: B0CQLSV5WC to buy the original filter of ZQA-2000A air purifier

SAVE SPACE: Cobectal Mini Air Purifier is compact (6.7 × 6.7 × 8.9 inches) and lightweight, making it ideal for desktops,offices and bedrooms. It has a voltage range of 110-240V, allowing its use in any country. This small air purifier has received certifications from the FCC. Families with children and pets can use the desktop air purifier with confidence. Cobectal provide you with a 1-year replacement warranty, please rest assured

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for the kitchen too
reviews.reviewText: Although the product is made for the bedroom, we really wanted something we can use in the kitchen after cooking meats. Our house will smell for hours and hours after cooking even if we use the hood vent. We have been using this purifier near the cooking area and it's worked very well. Our kitchen is about 500 sq ft so it seems to be good enough for thar.It does have a few features including a timer, fan speed, and filter percent. I do wish it has a air quality indicator. I can't really complain as our house smell pretty clean even after grilling meat and cooking bacon. It's also a pretty small unit, so finding a spot to place it is no problem.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars very effective at collecting dust particles from the air
reviews.reviewText: I like its square design, I can place it in any corner discreetly, it is very quiet and very effective. I have only a few days of use and I can already notice a change in my alegia, which is even reduced. I look at the filter and it collects many particles that are in the air and sometimes they are imperceptible I love it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I like that you can clean the filter on this with a vacuum instead of buying replacement filters.
